subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. All-Star Allen Iverson scored 15 points in his debut for Besiktas Cola Turka but failed to help his team avoid a 94-91 defeat against Hemofarm Stada in a European Cup game in Istanbul.
snippet: The former N.B.A. All-Star Allen Iverson scored 15 points in his debut for Besiktas Cola Turka but failed to help his team avoid a 94-91 defeat against Hemofarm Stada in a European Cup game in Istanbul.
